name: chat-app
description: A modern, real-time chat application built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js).   Featuring user authentication, real-time messaging with Socket.io, image uploads with Cloudinary, and a sleek frontend UI powered by React, TailwindCSS, and Zustand state management.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
